p: Survival was analysed using the counting process formulation of the Cox proportional hazard (CPH) model 61 62 63 in R 64, version 3.0.1 with the function ‘coxph’ of package survival 65, version 2.37-4. The counting process formulation allows the coefficient to be estimated at each time point and thus time-dependent covariates, such as minimum temperature, DTR and age can be included. Time was portioned into daily intervals for all analyses.
